duties_responsibilities.duty: Interpret blueprints, production orders, and B.O.M specifications for the powder coating process.
Cleanse products, identify correct method to hang parts, and remove parts from the line for material movement.
Maintain equipment, report machine malfunctions, and aid in preventative maintenance activities.
Maintain a safe and clean working environment, and ensure safe work practices within the department.
Perform all other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School Education or GED or equivalent practical work experience in a production or manufacturing setting. Experience with paint booth operations and automated powder coating line preferred.
